REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f0301 reute u f AM-ARMS-TALKS 03-09 0085

TEXT.TITLE: U.S., SOVIETS TO RESUME TALKS ON MEDIUM-RANGE MISSILES
TEXT.BODY: American and Soviet arms negotiators will resume talks on curbing medium-range nuclear missiles here tomorrow, a U.S. Spokesman said. The negotiations on nuclear and space arms formally recessed their seventh round last Friday. But both sides agreed that the group dealing with Intermediate Nuclear Forces (INF) would continue its work, following proposals introduced last week by both superpowers for deep cuts in those weapons. Reuter
